content.description:
Cunctanti1 telum Aeneas fatale coruscatcorusco, -are = vexo, -are, 
sortitussortior, -iri: to select fortunamfortunam = “the right moment” oculis, et corpore toto 
eminuseminus, adv.: at a distance intorquetintorqueo, -ere = iacto, -are.
 1:modifies an implied Turno↩
content.question: In line 1, what does cunctanti mean?
